entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 March 2023
